findings.title: Owner can change the tax and liquidity fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the tax and liquidity fee.

findings.title: Owner can change liquidity percentage for dev, marketing and charity
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the liquidity percentage allocated for development, marketing, and charitable purposes.

findings.title: Owner can change the maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the maximum transaction amount, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change dev, charity and marketing wallet
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the wallets associated with development, charity, and marketing.

findings.title: Owner can change uniswap router and pair
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify Uniswap router and pair settings.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from and include to autoliquidity
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude or include addresses from autoliquidity, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from the fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude certain addresses or transactions from paying fees.

findings.title: Owner can disable and enable swap and liquify
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to disable and enable swap and liquify functions.

findings.title: Owner can change _minTokenBalance
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the minimum token balance.

findings.title: Owner can set antiWhale threshold
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the anti-whale threshold.

findings.title: Owner can change _isAntiWhaleEnabled
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the anti-whale feature's enabled status.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from antiwhale, buy and maxTx
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude certain addresses from anti-whale protection, buying, and maximum transaction amount.

findings.title: Owner can lock and unlock
findings.description: The owner has the ability to lock and unlock certain functions, which could allow them to retake privileges even after ownership was renounced.
